column2: We're at a disadvantage in the dark here!
If we're stopping here, I can set up some sleeping mats. I go camping all the time with my kids!
I still have some of the videos from our glorious Republic saved on my device - something to watch to pass the time if we're staying here the night!
...If you ask me to cook, you won't like what I'm cooking.
Jolly good time to catch some z's, lads!
Some sleep might be good for us all.
I need sleep no longer, my my mind has been freed from the shackles of human weakness.
